scripts.cp:builder: rm -rf ref && mkdir ref && cp ../package.json ref/package.json && cp -r ../dist ref/dist && cp -r ../pluginTypes ref/pluginTypes
scripts.cp:local-pageblock: if [ -d pageblocks ] ; then cp -r pageblocks dist/modules/pageblocks ; fi
scripts.build: npm run cp:builder && rm -rf dist && npx @ijstech/compiler && npm run cp:local-pageblock
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run serve
